akas: Район тьмы. Хроники повседневного зла Russia
Dark Area. Daily Evil Chronicles USA (literal English title)
akas from release info: Район тьмы. Хроники повседневного зла Russia
Dark Area. Daily Evil Chronicles USA (literal English title)

0.title: Father Frost
0.plot: New Year's Eve. Mother gives her dear son a wonderful present. But suddenly something goes wrong... Family celebration becomes a nightmare. The mother is saved from a tearful holiday... by a very strange Father Frost.

1.title: This Is Love
1.plot: Tough and uncompromising story about what people can make of their love. A way the relationship can end. A result of total misunderstanding. But can you call love something that becomes more precious than life?

2.title: Crisis
2.plot: Family dinner in a good home. Well-coiffed mother, beautiful daughter, businessman husband. The idyll could last forever, but somewhere out there the destiny of this family is about to be defined. Russia is absorbed by economic crisis. Its bony hand knocks on the night window, and bad news comes fast. The head of the family realizes that the collapse of his company is inevitable, bankruptcy, shame and poverty are on their way. And then he goes berserk...

3.title: Snakes
3.plot: Teenagers are always difficult for parents to handle. Childhood is over and adult life begins. Liza is no exception. She is quick-tempered and rude to her parents. She feels that her father, a prosecutor and a wealthy man, scares away her first serious admirers... They fear to court a prosecutor's daughter. Mother tries to help but she is unaware of the true reasons behind Liza's behavior... She doesn't know about the horrible secret, the family tragedy, that her daughter deals with on her own. Doesn't know or doesn't want to know?

4.title: Revenge
4.plot: Night. Playground. A lone policeman with a bottle of vodka. Creepy pastoral of a big Russian city. And here comes a pal ready to hear what torments the restless soul of the drunk law enforcer... In a minute we find out about a terrible tragedy that happened in his life. No one can heal the pain. It can't be drowned in vodka, can't be forgotten in a heartwarming talk... The consolation is brought by a random bypasser. Who gets what he deserved. Contains expletives. 18+

5.title: Debt Collector
5.plot: A cruel, bloody and contradictory story about a debt collector whose latest client happened to be his long-time friend and fellow soldier. The debt sum isn't small. But the friendship of comrades-in-arms, who went through fire and water, is sacred. It begins with the memories of the Chechen War and the battles of Debaltseve... But only the outcome of the story will show who is who. Life proved to be more complex than any war. Attention! The film contains expletives and graphic violence. 18+

6.title: Stalin
6.plot: Open country. Under the Soviet scarlet flag stands a trio of strange people. And two more are filming them on camera. Slogans are heard, and threats, declarations of love to comrade Stalin, calls for mass shooting ... But... What is really going on here? Provocation, insanity, farce? No... A horrible crime is about to happen. The crime that's destined to enter the contemporary history of Russia. For motherland, for Stalin, as they said in the holy times! The film contains expletives and graphic violence. 18+

7.title: Pervert
7.plot: A dirty, gloomy, stinking brothel in the city. Trading young bodies is made a continuous stream. Ordinary debauchery. Any pleasures at your request, you only need to pay. Cheaply. Girls who end up here want to make some money. It's temporary, they console themselves. But a few can break free. The girls have different clients: deceived husbands, rapists, criminals. This time prostitute Annette got an unusual one... Who is he? A maniac, pervert, madman? Attention! The film contains expletives and graphic violence. Strictly 18+

8.title: Bitch
8.plot: An ordinary yard of an ordinary house. A man comes to an entrance. He opens the door. He pushes the elevator button. He enters his flat. Putting the kettle on, he looks through the window. You can't think of a more common story. But you have no idea what is going on at these moments in this man's head. An ordinary yard of an ordinary house. A man comes to an entrance. He opens the door. Attention! The film contains expletives and graphic violence. Strictly 18+

9.title: Zero
9.plot: When there is nothing to do, and the beer is gone, that do the village boys do? You are right! They go hunting for money to get more. But this time the robbery went all wrong. The boys ran into a very strange man... Attention! The film contains expletives and graphic violence. Strictly 18+

10.title: Princess
10.plot: She stood on a deserted road. Blizzard was howling, it was cold, and not a soul around... He saw her, approached and asked: "Do you want to be a princess? And I'll be your kind king! ". And she replied. Then he realized that he knew nothing about her... Attention! The film contains scary scenes and graphic violence. Strictly 18+

11.title: Justice
11.plot: This story begins when the police arrests a group of bloody real estate scammers, and ends in massacre.

12.title: Gain
12.plot: That night the experienced burglar Sarych had it all wrong. When he opened a house on a tip, the owners appeared to be home. The case fell through. But in the dark area, fate herself favors the likes of him. And so a mysterious client calls Sarych and offers him to get quick and easy money. Attention: the film contains expletives and graphic violence. Strictly 18+

imdb.plot outline: The black night of a sleepless city. Dark alleys of residential districts. In this city, the true sin city, every moment happens something horrible yet ordinary - somebody will die today, somebody will destroy themselves. The heroes are real, they live among us. But the dark area has no geographical location. Darkness is in everyone. Sometimes it comes out. And everyone makes a choice to free their darkness... or stay human.
imdb.title: Rayon tmy
plot: The black night of a sleepless city. Dark alleys of residential districts. In this city, the true sin city, every moment happens something horrible yet ordinary - somebody will die today, somebody will destroy themselves. The heroes are real, they live among us.
